articles.author: Adrianna Rodriguez
articles.title: New guidance for stroke prevention includes Ozempic, other weight loss drugs - USA TODAY
articles.description: For the first time in a decade, the American Heart Association and American Stroke Association issued new recommendations for preventing strokes.
articles.content:
Experts this week identified new risks and issued updated recommendations for preventing strokes, a leading cause of death and disability in the U.S.

articles.author: Curt Merrill, Matt Stiles, Ethan Cohen
articles.title: Tracking early voting trends by party, age and race — in maps and charts - CNN
articles.description: Millions of Americans have already cast their ballots in the November election, either by mail or through early in-person voting, getting a head start on shaping the presidential race.
articles.content: CNN is monitoring who is casting pre-election ballots in the 36 states that offer early voting, as well as how early voting numbers compare with four years ago, when pre-election voting reached histo… [+973 chars]
